text: That's an awful take. Surely the real reason is that US authoraties answer to US politicians, and therefore indirectly to the US electorate. If they decide that they'll accept EU authoraties, that's fine, but if they want to have different standards, that's fine as well. There's a lot of stuff banned in the EU which is not banned in US.
